title: $:/plugins/benwebber/expand
name: expand
description: Expand upon terms without breaking the flow of text
author: Ben Webber
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/benwebber/expand/README":{"title":"$:/plugins/benwebber/expand/README","text":"''expand'' lets you define terms in text without breaking the flow.

{{$:/plugins/benwebber/expand/macros/public}}
"},"$:/plugins/benwebber/expand/styles":{"text":".tw-m-0{margin:0}.tw-cursor-pointer{cursor:pointer}.tw-border-none{border-style:none}.tw-bg-transparent{background-color:initial}.tw-p-0{padding:0}.tw-underline{text-decoration-line:underline}.tw-decoration-dotted{text-decoration-style:dotted}.hover\:tw-decoration-solid:hover{text-decoration-style:solid}","title":"$:/plugins/benwebber/expand/styles","type":"text/css","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet"},"$:/plugins/benwebber/expand/macros/private":{"title":"$:/plugins/benwebber/expand/macros/private","text":"\define expand.toggle()
<$list filter="[<stateTiddler>is[tiddler]]">
  <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<<stateTiddler>> />
</$list>
<$list filter="[<stateTiddler>!is[tiddler]]">
  <$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<<stateTiddler>> text="true" />
</$list>
\end
"},"$:/plugins/benwebber/expand/macros/public":{"title":"$:/plugins/benwebber/expand/macros/public","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":"\define expand.dt(term, text)
\whitespace trim
\import [[$:/plugins/benwebber/expand/macros/private]]
<$vars stateTiddler=<<qualify "$:/state/plugins/benwebber/expand/$term$">>>
  <$set name=text filter="[<__text__>is[blank]] +[then<__term__>else<__text__>]" select=0>
    <$button class="expand-dd tw-bg-transparent tw-border-none tw-cursor-pointer tw-decoration-dotted tw-m-0 tw-p-0 tw-underline hover:tw-decoration-solid" actions=<<expand.toggle>>>
      <<text>>
    </$button>
  </$set>
</$vars>
\end

\define expand.dd(term, text)
\whitespace trim
\import [[$:/plugins/benwebber/expand/macros/private]]
<$vars stateTiddler=<<qualify "$:/state/plugins/benwebber/expand/$term$">>>
  <!-- HACK: Preserve leading space (e.g., before a new sentence). -->
  <$set name=space filter="[<__text__>prefix[ ]] +[then[ ]else[]]" select=0>
    <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<<stateTiddler>> text="" class="expand-dt">
      <<space>><<__text__>>
    </$reveal>
  </$set>
</$vars>
\end


!! `expand.dt`

Introduce a term to expand later.

This creates a button that the reader can click to expand the related term.
The button has the CSS class `expand-dt`.

!!! Parameters

;term
: The term to define. If you specify `text`, this can be a convenient identifier instead.

;text
: Optional text to display instead of the term.

!!! Examples

```
<<expand.dt "tons BOM">>
<<expand.dt "bom" "tons BOM">>
```

!! `expand.dd`

Define a term.

The revealed text has the CSS class `expand-dd`.

!!! Parameters

;term
: The term to define, as specified in `expand.dt`.

;text
: The definition text.

!!! Examples

```
<<expand.dd "tons BOM" " (Builder's Own Measurement…)">>
<<expand.dd "bom" " (Builder's Own Measurement…)">>
```
"}}}
